spells.name: Creo Aquam
spells.description: Creates a small amount of pure water, enough to fill a bucket or water skin. The water is clean and safe to drink.
spells.guidelines: Base 1 (create water), +2 Voice, +0 for small amount
spells.searchText: creo aquam creates a small amount of pure water, enough to fill a bucket or water skin. the water is clean and safe to drink. base 1 (create water), +2 voice, +0 for small amount

spells.name: Spring of Gushing Water
spells.description: Creates a flowing spring that produces clean water continuously for the duration. The spring yields enough water for a small community.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (create flowing water), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 for continuous flow
spells.searchText: spring of gushing water creates a flowing spring that produces clean water continuously for the duration. the spring yields enough water for a small community. base 5 (create flowing water), +1 touch, +2 sun, +1 for continuous flow

spells.name: Purify the Tainted Waters
spells.description: Purifies a body of water, removing all impurities, diseases, and poisons. The water becomes perfectly clean and safe to drink.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (purify water), +1 Touch
spells.searchText: purify the tainted waters purifies a body of water, removing all impurities, diseases, and poisons. the water becomes perfectly clean and safe to drink. base 5 (purify water), +1 touch

spells.name: Wine from Water
spells.description: Transforms water into high-quality wine. The wine has excellent flavor and properties, equivalent to the finest vintages.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (transform liquid), +1 Touch, +2 Group, +1 Herbam requisite
spells.searchText: wine from water transforms water into high-quality wine. the wine has excellent flavor and properties, equivalent to the finest vintages. base 5 (transform liquid), +1 touch, +2 group, +1 herbam requisite

spells.name: Healing Waters of Life
spells.description: Creates a pool of magical healing water. Anyone who drinks from it heals one light wound, and bathing in it provides additional restoration.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create magical water), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Corpus requisite
spells.searchText: healing waters of life creates a pool of magical healing water. anyone who drinks from it heals one light wound, and bathing in it provides additional restoration. base 15 (create magical water), +1 touch, +2 sun, +1 corpus requisite

spells.name: Torrent of Rushing Water
spells.description: Creates a powerful stream of water that can knock down enemies, extinguish fires, or clear obstacles. The force is considerable.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (create forceful water), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration, +1 for force
spells.searchText: torrent of rushing water creates a powerful stream of water that can knock down enemies, extinguish fires, or clear obstacles. the force is considerable. base 10 (create forceful water), +2 voice, +1 concentration, +1 for force

spells.name: Ice from Nothing
spells.description: Creates a substantial amount of ice that lasts for the duration. The ice can be shaped as desired when created.
spells.guidelines: Base 3 (create ice), +2 Voice, +2 Sun, +1 for shaping
spells.searchText: ice from nothing creates a substantial amount of ice that lasts for the duration. the ice can be shaped as desired when created. base 3 (create ice), +2 voice, +2 sun, +1 for shaping

spells.name: Well of Endless Depths
spells.description: Creates a permanent well that never runs dry, providing an endless supply of clean water. The well reaches deep into the earth.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create permanent water source), +1 Touch, +4 Year, +1 Terram requisite
spells.searchText: well of endless depths creates a permanent well that never runs dry, providing an endless supply of clean water. the well reaches deep into the earth. base 15 (create permanent water source), +1 touch, +4 year, +1 terram requisite

spells.name: Blessing of the Sacred Pool
spells.description: Creates a pool of holy water that repels demons and undead. The water glows with soft light and causes fear in evil creatures.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (create blessed water), +1 Touch, +3 Moon, +1 Vim requisite
spells.searchText: blessing of the sacred pool creates a pool of holy water that repels demons and undead. the water glows with soft light and causes fear in evil creatures. base 20 (create blessed water), +1 touch, +3 moon, +1 vim requisite

spells.name: Mist of Concealment
spells.description: Creates a thick mist that obscures vision and provides concealment. The mist is cool and refreshing but blocks sight beyond a few feet.
spells.guidelines: Base 3 (create mist), +2 Voice, +1 Diameter, +2 Room
spells.searchText: mist of concealment creates a thick mist that obscures vision and provides concealment. the mist is cool and refreshing but blocks sight beyond a few feet. base 3 (create mist), +2 voice, +1 diameter, +2 room

spells.name: Potion of Liquid Courage
spells.description: Creates a magical elixir that grants courage and removes fear when consumed. The drinker becomes bold and confident.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (create magical liquid), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Mentem requisite
spells.searchText: potion of liquid courage creates a magical elixir that grants courage and removes fear when consumed. the drinker becomes bold and confident. base 10 (create magical liquid), +1 touch, +2 sun, +1 mentem requisite

spells.name: Taste of the Spices and Herbs
spells.description: Reveals all the ingredients and components in a liquid, including poisons, medicines, or magical substances. The caster tastes without consuming.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (analyze liquid), +1 Touch
spells.searchText: taste of the spices and herbs reveals all the ingredients and components in a liquid, including poisons, medicines, or magical substances. the caster tastes without consuming. base 4 (analyze liquid), +1 touch

spells.name: Sense the Flowing Waters
spells.description: Allows the caster to sense the location and flow of water sources within a moderate distance, even underground streams or hidden springs.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (locate water), +0 Personal, +1 Concentration, +1 Touch
spells.searchText: sense the flowing waters allows the caster to sense the location and flow of water sources within a moderate distance, even underground streams or hidden springs. base 4 (locate water), +0 personal, +1 concentration, +1 touch

spells.name: Purity of the Flowing River
spells.description: Determines the purity and safety of water, revealing any contamination, disease, or magical taint present in the liquid.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (assess purity), +1 Touch
spells.searchText: purity of the flowing river determines the purity and safety of water, revealing any contamination, disease, or magical taint present in the liquid. base 4 (assess purity), +1 touch

spells.name: Eyes Beneath the Waves
spells.description: Allows the caster to see clearly underwater, regardless of depth or water clarity. Water becomes as transparent as air to the caster's vision.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (see through water), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +3 Vision
spells.searchText: eyes beneath the waves allows the caster to see clearly underwater, regardless of depth or water clarity. water becomes as transparent as air to the caster's vision. base 10 (see through water), +0 personal, +2 sun, +3 vision

spells.name: Whispers of the Distant Shore
spells.description: By touching a body of water, the caster can sense events happening along its entire length - rivers, lakes, or coastlines reveal their secrets.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (distant sensing), +1 Touch, +1 Concentration
spells.searchText: whispers of the distant shore by touching a body of water, the caster can sense events happening along its entire length - rivers, lakes, or coastlines reveal their secrets. base 15 (distant sensing), +1 touch, +1 concentration

spells.name: Memory of the Ancient Rain
spells.description: Reveals the history of a body of water - where it has been, what it has touched, and what events have occurred in or near it.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (read water memory), +1 Touch
spells.searchText: memory of the ancient rain reveals the history of a body of water - where it has been, what it has touched, and what events have occurred in or near it. base 15 (read water memory), +1 touch

spells.name: Sense the Deep Currents
spells.description: Grants understanding of water currents, tides, and flow patterns. The caster can predict changes in water movement and find safe passage.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (understand currents), +1 Touch, +2 Sun
spells.searchText: sense the deep currents grants understanding of water currents, tides, and flow patterns. the caster can predict changes in water movement and find safe passage. base 5 (understand currents), +1 touch, +2 sun

spells.name: Touch of the Drowned Man
spells.description: By touching water, reveals if anyone has drowned in it recently and can provide details about their identity and circumstances.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (detect death in water), +1 Touch, +1 Corpus requisite
spells.searchText: touch of the drowned man by touching water, reveals if anyone has drowned in it recently and can provide details about their identity and circumstances. base 15 (detect death in water), +1 touch, +1 corpus requisite

spells.name: Ears of the Ocean Deep
spells.description: Allows the caster to hear sounds carried by water across great distances. Underwater sounds, voices near water, and aquatic communications become audible.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (enhance hearing through water), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +3 Hearing
spells.searchText: ears of the ocean deep allows the caster to hear sounds carried by water across great distances. underwater sounds, voices near water, and aquatic communications become audible. base 10 (enhance hearing through water), +0 personal, +2 sun, +3 hearing

spells.name: Breath of the Deep Waters
spells.description: Allows the caster to breathe underwater by extracting air from water. The caster can remain submerged indefinitely during the spell's duration.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (extract air from water), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +1 Auram requisite
spells.searchText: breath of the deep waters allows the caster to breathe underwater by extracting air from water. the caster can remain submerged indefinitely during the spell's duration. base 10 (extract air from water), +0 personal, +2 sun, +1 auram requisite

spells.name: Transform Water to Wine
spells.description: Transforms water into fine wine with excellent taste and quality. The transformation is permanent and the wine ages normally thereafter.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (transform liquid), +1 Touch, +1 Herbam requisite
spells.searchText: transform water to wine transforms water into fine wine with excellent taste and quality. the transformation is permanent and the wine ages normally thereafter. base 4 (transform liquid), +1 touch, +1 herbam requisite

spells.name: Turn Water to Ice
spells.description: Instantly freezes a body of water solid. The ice is as hard as stone and can be shaped during the transformation.
spells.guidelines: Base 3 (change water state), +2 Voice, +2 Sun
spells.searchText: turn water to ice instantly freezes a body of water solid. the ice is as hard as stone and can be shaped during the transformation. base 3 (change water state), +2 voice, +2 sun

spells.name: Waters of Eternal Preservation
spells.description: Transforms water into a preservative liquid that prevents decay and spoilage. Items immersed remain perfectly fresh for the duration.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (grant preservative properties), +1 Touch, +3 Moon
spells.searchText: waters of eternal preservation transforms water into a preservative liquid that prevents decay and spoilage. items immersed remain perfectly fresh for the duration. base 10 (grant preservative properties), +1 touch, +3 moon

spells.name: Lungs of the Fish
spells.description: Allows a person to breathe water as easily as air by transforming the water around their nose and mouth into breathable substance.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (transform water for breathing), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Auram requisite
spells.searchText: lungs of the fish allows a person to breathe water as easily as air by transforming the water around their nose and mouth into breathable substance. base 10 (transform water for breathing), +1 touch, +2 sun, +1 auram requisite

spells.name: Poison into Pure Water
spells.description: Neutralizes all poisons and toxins in a liquid, transforming contaminated water into pure, drinkable form. The transformation is permanent.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (purify liquid), +1 Touch
spells.searchText: poison into pure water neutralizes all poisons and toxins in a liquid, transforming contaminated water into pure, drinkable form. the transformation is permanent. base 10 (purify liquid), +1 touch

spells.name: Liquid of Leaping
spells.description: Transforms water into a springy, elastic liquid that can propel objects or people upward with great force when compressed.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (grant elastic properties), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Rego requisite
spells.searchText: liquid of leaping transforms water into a springy, elastic liquid that can propel objects or people upward with great force when compressed. base 15 (grant elastic properties), +1 touch, +2 sun, +1 rego requisite

spells.name: Blood to Water
spells.description: Transforms the blood in a living creature's body into harmless water, causing immediate death unless the effect is reversed quickly.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (transform vital liquid), +2 Voice, +1 Corpus requisite
spells.searchText: blood to water transforms the blood in a living creature's body into harmless water, causing immediate death unless the effect is reversed quickly. base 10 (transform vital liquid), +2 voice, +1 corpus requisite

spells.name: Hardened Water Shield
spells.description: Transforms water into a hard, shield-like barrier that can deflect weapons and projectiles while remaining flexible to the touch.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (harden liquid), +1 Touch, +1 Diameter, +2 for selective hardness
spells.searchText: hardened water shield transforms water into a hard, shield-like barrier that can deflect weapons and projectiles while remaining flexible to the touch. base 10 (harden liquid), +1 touch, +1 diameter, +2 for selective hardness

spells.name: Mist of Confusion
spells.description: Transforms water vapor into a disorienting mist that causes confusion and memory loss in those who breathe it.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (transform mist), +2 Voice, +1 Diameter, +2 Room, +1 Mentem requisite
spells.searchText: mist of confusion transforms water vapor into a disorienting mist that causes confusion and memory loss in those who breathe it. base 5 (transform mist), +2 voice, +1 diameter, +2 room, +1 mentem requisite

spells.name: Acid from Pure Water
spells.description: Transforms harmless water into powerful acid capable of dissolving stone and metal. The acid can be controlled to avoid harming the caster.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create destructive liquid), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Perdo requisite
spells.searchText: acid from pure water transforms harmless water into powerful acid capable of dissolving stone and metal. the acid can be controlled to avoid harming the caster. base 15 (create destructive liquid), +1 touch, +2 sun, +1 perdo requisite

spells.name: Walking on Water
spells.description: Transforms the surface tension of water to support the weight of a person, allowing them to walk across the surface as if it were solid ground.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (alter water properties), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 for surface support
spells.searchText: walking on water transforms the surface tension of water to support the weight of a person, allowing them to walk across the surface as if it were solid ground. base 5 (alter water properties), +1 touch, +2 sun, +1 for surface support

spells.name: Curse of the Desert Throat
spells.description: This spell destroys all liquid within a person's mouth and throat, causing immediate and intense thirst. The target cannot speak properly for several minutes and suffers discomfort until they can drink something.
spells.guidelines: Base 2 (destroy a trivial amount of liquid), +2 Voice, +1 for targeting within a person
spells.searchText: curse of the desert throat this spell destroys all liquid within a person's mouth and throat, causing immediate and intense thirst. the target cannot speak properly for several minutes and suffers discomfort until they can drink something. base 2 (destroy a trivial amount of liquid), +2 voice, +1 for targeting within a person

spells.name: Dry the Sodden Clothes
spells.description: This practical spell instantly removes all water from clothing, equipment, or other objects. Wet garments become completely dry, and water damage to scrolls or books is prevented if cast quickly enough.
spells.guidelines: Base 3 (destroy water from objects), +1 Touch
spells.searchText: dry the sodden clothes this practical spell instantly removes all water from clothing, equipment, or other objects. wet garments become completely dry, and water damage to scrolls or books is prevented if cast quickly enough. base 3 (destroy water from objects), +1 touch

spells.name: Drain the Foul Pool
spells.description: This spell completely destroys all standing water within a room-sized area. Ponds, puddles, and shallow streams simply vanish, leaving behind any sediment or objects that were submerged. The spell cannot affect flowing water with strong current.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (destroy a substantial amount of water), +2 Voice, +2 Room
spells.searchText: drain the foul pool this spell completely destroys all standing water within a room-sized area. ponds, puddles, and shallow streams simply vanish, leaving behind any sediment or objects that were submerged. the spell cannot affect flowing water with strong current. base 4 (destroy a substantial amount of water), +2 voice, +2 room

spells.name: Poison the Well
spells.description: This insidious spell corrupts a source of water, making it harmful to drink. Anyone consuming the water must make a Stamina + 6 roll or suffer the effects of mild poisoning (Light Wound). The contamination is not detectable by normal means.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (make water harmful), +1 Touch, +3 Moon
spells.searchText: poison the well this insidious spell corrupts a source of water, making it harmful to drink. anyone consuming the water must make a stamina + 6 roll or suffer the effects of mild poisoning (light wound). the contamination is not detectable by normal means. base 4 (make water harmful), +1 touch, +3 moon

spells.name: Dessicate the Mortal Frame
spells.description: This deadly spell removes moisture from a living being's body, causing severe dehydration and damage. The target takes a Heavy Wound as their body rapidly loses essential fluids. This spell is particularly effective against creatures that depend heavily on water.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (destroy vital fluids), +2 Voice, +1 Corpus requisite
spells.searchText: dessicate the mortal frame this deadly spell removes moisture from a living being's body, causing severe dehydration and damage. the target takes a heavy wound as their body rapidly loses essential fluids. this spell is particularly effective against creatures that depend heavily on water. base 10 (destroy vital fluids), +2 voice, +1 corpus requisite

spells.name: Destroy the Healing Draught
spells.description: This spell specifically targets and destroys beneficial liquids, particularly healing potions and magical draughts. The liquid becomes inert and useless, though it may still appear normal. The spell can neutralize most liquid-based magical preparations.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (destroy magical liquids), +2 Voice
spells.searchText: destroy the healing draught this spell specifically targets and destroys beneficial liquids, particularly healing potions and magical draughts. the liquid becomes inert and useless, though it may still appear normal. the spell can neutralize most liquid-based magical preparations. base 5 (destroy magical liquids), +2 voice

spells.name: Sour the Wine and Ale
spells.description: This spell ruins alcoholic beverages by destroying their essential properties. Wine becomes vinegar, ale becomes undrinkable swill, and other fermented drinks lose their potency and flavor. The liquid remains but becomes virtually worthless.
spells.guidelines: Base 3 (spoil prepared liquids), +2 Voice, +2 Group
spells.searchText: sour the wine and ale this spell ruins alcoholic beverages by destroying their essential properties. wine becomes vinegar, ale becomes undrinkable swill, and other fermented drinks lose their potency and flavor. the liquid remains but becomes virtually worthless. base 3 (spoil prepared liquids), +2 voice, +2 group

spells.name: Banish the Flood Waters
spells.description: This powerful spell can destroy vast quantities of water across a large area. It can drain flooded fields, empty small lakes, or stop flooding by making the water simply vanish. The spell affects all standing or slow-moving water within the boundary.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (destroy massive amounts of water), +3 Sight, +4 Boundary
spells.searchText: banish the flood waters this powerful spell can destroy vast quantities of water across a large area. it can drain flooded fields, empty small lakes, or stop flooding by making the water simply vanish. the spell affects all standing or slow-moving water within the boundary. base 10 (destroy massive amounts of water), +3 sight, +4 boundary

spells.name: Blood to Dust
spells.description: This lethal spell destroys the blood within a living creature, causing instant death in most cases. The blood literally turns to dust within the victim's veins. Only the most hardy creatures can survive such trauma, and even they suffer an Incapacitating Wound.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (destroy vital bodily fluids), +2 Voice, +1 Corpus requisite
spells.searchText: blood to dust this lethal spell destroys the blood within a living creature, causing instant death in most cases. the blood literally turns to dust within the victim's veins. only the most hardy creatures can survive such trauma, and even they suffer an incapacitating wound. base 15 (destroy vital bodily fluids), +2 voice, +1 corpus requisite

spells.name: Destroy the Ice and Snow
spells.description: This spell completely destroys ice and snow, causing it to vanish without melting or leaving any trace. Unlike melting, this leaves no water behind. It can clear icy paths, destroy ice weapons, or eliminate snow from an area instantly.
spells.guidelines: Base 2 (destroy solid water), +2 Voice
spells.searchText: destroy the ice and snow this spell completely destroys ice and snow, causing it to vanish without melting or leaving any trace. unlike melting, this leaves no water behind. it can clear icy paths, destroy ice weapons, or eliminate snow from an area instantly. base 2 (destroy solid water), +2 voice

spells.name: Part the Rushing Waters
spells.description: This spell forces water to move aside, creating a dry path through rivers, streams, or standing water. The water forms walls on either side of the path, allowing safe passage across bodies of water. The effect lasts as long as the caster concentrates.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (control moving water), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration
spells.searchText: part the rushing waters this spell forces water to move aside, creating a dry path through rivers, streams, or standing water. the water forms walls on either side of the path, allowing safe passage across bodies of water. the effect lasts as long as the caster concentrates. base 4 (control moving water), +2 voice, +1 concentration

spells.name: Gesture of the Flowing River
spells.description: This spell allows the caster to direct the flow of water with hand gestures. Rivers can be made to flow uphill, change direction, or flow in impossible patterns. The water moves according to the caster's will and gestures.
spells.guidelines: Base 3 (direct water flow), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration
spells.searchText: gesture of the flowing river this spell allows the caster to direct the flow of water with hand gestures. rivers can be made to flow uphill, change direction, or flow in impossible patterns. the water moves according to the caster's will and gestures. base 3 (direct water flow), +2 voice, +1 concentration

spells.name: Invisible Sling of Vilano
spells.description: This spell hurls a ball of water at a target with tremendous force. The water strikes like a physical projectile, dealing +5 damage and potentially knocking the target down. The water disperses after impact, leaving the target soaked.
spells.guidelines: Base 3 (forcefully move water), +2 Voice
spells.searchText: invisible sling of vilano this spell hurls a ball of water at a target with tremendous force. the water strikes like a physical projectile, dealing +5 damage and potentially knocking the target down. the water disperses after impact, leaving the target soaked. base 3 (forcefully move water), +2 voice

spells.name: Bridge of Frost
spells.description: This spell shapes water into a solid bridge of ice that can span gaps or allow passage over water. The bridge is strong enough to support multiple people and their equipment. It appears as a graceful arch of crystalline ice.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (major water shaping), +2 Voice, +2 Sun
spells.searchText: bridge of frost this spell shapes water into a solid bridge of ice that can span gaps or allow passage over water. the bridge is strong enough to support multiple people and their equipment. it appears as a graceful arch of crystalline ice. base 4 (major water shaping), +2 voice, +2 sun

spells.name: Prison of Flowing Water
spells.description: This spell creates a sphere of swirling water around a target, trapping them inside. The water constantly flows around the victim, making it impossible to breathe or escape. The victim begins drowning unless they can break free or the concentration is broken.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (control water around person), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration
spells.searchText: prison of flowing water this spell creates a sphere of swirling water around a target, trapping them inside. the water constantly flows around the victim, making it impossible to breathe or escape. the victim begins drowning unless they can break free or the concentration is broken. base 5 (control water around person), +2 voice, +1 concentration

spells.name: Neptune's Watery Tentacles
spells.description: This spell creates multiple tentacles of flowing water that can grab, strike, or manipulate objects. The tentacles are semi-solid and can exert considerable force. They can attack multiple targets simultaneously or work together to accomplish complex tasks.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (create complex water constructs), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration, +2 Group
spells.searchText: neptune's watery tentacles this spell creates multiple tentacles of flowing water that can grab, strike, or manipulate objects. the tentacles are semi-solid and can exert considerable force. they can attack multiple targets simultaneously or work together to accomplish complex tasks. base 10 (create complex water constructs), +2 voice, +1 concentration, +2 group

spells.name: Draw Forth the Thirsty Earth
spells.description: This spell draws water up from underground sources, creating springs or filling dried wells. The water rises through soil and rock to reach the surface, providing a reliable water source for the duration of the spell.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (control distant water), +2 Voice, +2 Sun, +2 Room, +1 Terram requisite
spells.searchText: draw forth the thirsty earth this spell draws water up from underground sources, creating springs or filling dried wells. the water rises through soil and rock to reach the surface, providing a reliable water source for the duration of the spell. base 5 (control distant water), +2 voice, +2 sun, +2 room, +1 terram requisite

spells.name: Mastery of the Pouring Wine
spells.description: This spell allows precise control over liquids, enabling the caster to pour wine, ale, or other beverages with perfect accuracy. The liquid can be made to flow in streams, form shapes in the air, or pour itself from containers without spilling.
spells.guidelines: Base 2 (minor liquid control), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration
spells.searchText: mastery of the pouring wine this spell allows precise control over liquids, enabling the caster to pour wine, ale, or other beverages with perfect accuracy. the liquid can be made to flow in streams, form shapes in the air, or pour itself from containers without spilling. base 2 (minor liquid control), +2 voice, +1 concentration

spells.name: Tsunami of Divine Wrath
spells.description: This devastating spell creates a massive wave of water that sweeps across a large area, destroying everything in its path. The wave can level buildings, uproot trees, and wash away entire settlements. Only the most powerful magi can control such enormous forces.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (control massive water), +3 Sight, +4 Boundary
spells.searchText: tsunami of divine wrath this devastating spell creates a massive wave of water that sweeps across a large area, destroying everything in its path. the wave can level buildings, uproot trees, and wash away entire settlements. only the most powerful magi can control such enormous forces. base 15 (control massive water), +3 sight, +4 boundary

spells.name: Cloak of Mist and Rain
spells.description: This spell surrounds the target with a thin layer of mist and moisture that provides concealment and protection. The misty cloak makes the person harder to see and provides some protection against fire-based attacks. The mist moves with the target.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (shape water around person), +1 Touch, +2 Sun

spells.name: Whirlpool of Grasping Depths
spells.description: This spell creates a powerful whirlpool in any large body of water. The swirling vortex can drag down ships, swimmers, or anything on the water's surface. The whirlpool's size and strength make it virtually impossible to escape once caught in its grip.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create major water phenomenon), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration, +3 Structure
spells.searchText: whirlpool of grasping depths this spell creates a powerful whirlpool in any large body of water. the swirling vortex can drag down ships, swimmers, or anything on the water's surface. the whirlpool's size and strength make it virtually impossible to escape once caught in its grip. base 15 (create major water phenomenon), +2 voice, +1 concentration, +3 structure

spells.name: Blessing of the Pure Spring
spells.description: This spell purifies and controls a water source, ensuring it provides clean, fresh water for an entire month. The water becomes crystal clear, tastes pure, and remains free from contamination. The spell also regulates the flow to provide a steady supply.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (control water quality), +1 Touch, +3 Moon
spells.searchText: blessing of the pure spring this spell purifies and controls a water source, ensuring it provides clean, fresh water for an entire month. the water becomes crystal clear, tastes pure, and remains free from contamination. the spell also regulates the flow to provide a steady supply. base 4 (control water quality), +1 touch, +3 moon
